question: Will there be a direct line for agent/brokers and Assisters?
text:
Will there be a direct line for agent/brokers and Assisters?
          
        
Yes, we will have a broker and assister-specific phone line that goes to Level 2 Customer Service Representatives (CSR). Please call 1-844-844-4440 to be connected with a Pennie Customer Service representative who can help answer any questions you might have.
